name: ForePoint Networks
overview:
ForePoint Networks, LLC provides wireless Internet services for households, apartment complexes, municipalities, and businesses in the United States. It offers business solutions, which include commercial bandwidth, data backup, network consulting, and a data center; and residential broadband solutions. The company provides QuickBooks Conference Kit, a conference package for CPA firms, intuit solution providers, QuickBooks ProAdvisors, and others interested in hosting their own QuickBooks users conference.

ForePoint Networks, LLC was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Lafayette, Indiana. As of March 31, 2009, ForePoint Networks, LLC operates as a subsidiary of Omnicity, Corp.
